channel.title: Forum Addiction - Community Forum
channel.description:
*removed* is a very addictive Forum which is very new but has started a very positive and good way. Our Forums are vBulletin and we have discussion about RSPS, WOW, EVE, Graphics, Hacking, Gaming, Web Developement, Chatbox and also lots more to come... I am hoping to see a lot of you around on our Forums. If anyone is interested please PM me.
Thanks,

item.title: Forum Addiction - Community Forum
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

No advertising allowed. Please have a look at the rules but feel free to keep it in your signature.

Read full topic

your forums free? before you edited your first post, you mentioned “donators get special ranks”

item.title: Forum Addiction - Community Forum
item.dc:creator: @V2_Nick V2 Nick
item.description:
@V2_Nick wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:8, topic:346365”][quote author=V2 Nick link=topic=442744.msg3251392#msg3251392 date=1277780818]
Cough run3l0cus Cough And may I please re-post my link because I beleive it is not advertising RSPS’ them selves as our forum is more about other subjects than RSPS.
Thanks.
[/quote]

The first 5 to 10 thousand members on rL were stolen by a former Global Moderator on this site. It only makes since that a site that grew from this site would be our main competition.[/quote]
Shows that the staff on here are:
A. UN-trusted.
B. Not very intelligent.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Addiction - Community Forum
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“V2 Nick, post:5, topic:346365”]Nothing much, but answer me this question.
Why is Moparscape unique? Every other RSPS Community piratically has the same except most just have a lot better Forums.[/quote]

We were here first, we have a much larger user base to offer help, and our forums are ran by intelligent staff. Most other forums can hardly say they have one of those attributes.

Read full topic
